name: The Scuffed Series 17 - Inside the Nebula
name_original: The Scuffed Series 17 - Inside the Nebula
description:
4.5/5 - Movement and shooting feels great, looks are also nice

You control a spaceship that automatically shoots where your mouse cursor points. Mercenaries trapped you inside a nebula. Their motherships are releasing a constant horde of smaller ships to hunt you down. Kill them before they kill you.

Your ship can also enter hyper speed to ram smaller ships into oblivion.

You can toggle fullscreen with Alt + Enter and resize the window with Alt + Arrow up and Alt + Arrow Down

If you want to find out what The Scuffed Series is all about, check out the website (link in infos down below)
